Package org.pmedv.util

Interface Summary
PathConverter This interface is used to convert all links inside the content of a specific node in order to create a static export of a site.
 

Class Summary
ArrayUtils Static utility class containing some static convenience methods for array handling
BlogUtil  
BrowserUtils  
DBCPConnectionProvider A connection provider that uses an Apache commons DBCP connection pool.
DifferenceEntry A DifferenceEntry is generated for a node compare, once a remote node differs to a local node (new or changed), a new difference entry is created and added to a list of differing nodes.
DocumentBuilder Static helper class for document generation with Apache FOP For further documentation visit the apache FOP site
ImageUtils  
NodeHelper  
NodeUtil This utility class provides some convenient helper methods for the node system.
PluginClassDiscovery This class can be used to obtain a list of all classes in a classpath.
RequestUtil  
ResourceUtils Static utility class for handling resources
SampleStrutsPlugin  
SchemaInstaller  
SessionUtil  
SiteHelper  
StringUtil Static helper class containing some convenience methods for string handling
UploadManager  
URLUTF8Encoder Provides a method to encode any string into a URL-safe form.
ZipUtils  
 

Enum Summary
DifferenceType The difference type determines whether a nodes is new or just changed
